title: Blessing of Glory

tokens.lyric: Now the light of glory a

lines.raw: [A]Now the light of glory a[F#m]rises like the [A]sun that [D]shines on [A]high; [E7]
[F#m]Now awaken [C#m]into [F#m]freedom, O re[D]vive, you spirits, O re[A]vive!
[F#m]Wake the [D]mountains and the [Bm]valleys; bring a[E7]live the springs of the [A]earth.
[E7]Light the [A]world for[F#m]ever with the [C#m]Light of [F#m]your re[C#m]birth. [A7]
[D]Light the [A]world for[F#m]ever with the [A]Light of [E7]your re[A]birth.

tokens.lyric: We are called to bring back the glory to the life of God above;

lines.raw: We are called to bring back the glory to the life of God above;

tokens.lyric: Now the Lord in His greatness fills the universe with tender love,

lines.raw: Now the Lord in His greatness fills the universe with tender love,

tokens.lyric: Ever seeking souls awakened, ever calling them to be free.

lines.raw: Ever seeking souls awakened, ever calling them to be free.

tokens.lyric: How shall I attend Him who is calling to me?

lines.raw: How shall I attend Him who is calling to me?

tokens.lyric: How shall I attend Him who is calling to me?

lines.raw: How shall I attend Him who is calling to me?

tokens.lyric: From the dark of death I awaken and rejoice to live in grace;

lines.raw: From the dark of death I awaken and rejoice to live in grace;

tokens.lyric: When the one who came to save me holds me tenderly in His embrace;

lines.raw: When the one who came to save me holds me tenderly in His embrace;

tokens.lyric: I rejoice to feel the comfort of the love He has for me.

lines.raw: I rejoice to feel the comfort of the love He has for me.

tokens.lyric: What a blessing of glory to rejoice eternally

lines.raw: What a blessing of glory to rejoice eternally

tokens.lyric: What a blessing of glory to rejoice eternally

lines.raw: What a blessing of glory to rejoice eternally

tokens.lyric: Now He lifts me up to embrace me in the blessing that is mine;

lines.raw: Now He lifts me up to embrace me in the blessing that is mine;

tokens.lyric: What a blessing to receive Him in a love so tender and divine;

lines.raw: What a blessing to receive Him in a love so tender and divine;

tokens.lyric: How can I return the blessing though in all my life I will try;

lines.raw: How can I return the blessing though in all my life I will try;

tokens.lyric: I can never stop feeling how unworthy am I

lines.raw: I can never stop feeling how unworthy am I

tokens.lyric: I can never stop feeling how unworthy am I

lines.raw: I can never stop feeling how unworthy am I
